data.thought:
S97|I|S95-96|WHAT THOUGHTBOX ENABLES that base agent lacks:

1) DELIBERATION - Can plan, reconsider, revise. Not just react.

2) LEARNING (within session) - Can note what worked, avoid what didn't. Improvement trajectory.

3) EXPLANATION - Can show reasoning, not just outputs. Accountable cognition.

4) COLLABORATION - Human can engage with process, not just product. True partnership.

5) SELF-KNOWLEDGE - Can examine own thinking patterns. Meta-cognitive capacity.

6) CONTINUITY - Reasoning persists beyond immediate context. Temporal existence.

These aren't just features. They're CAPACITIES that define a different mode of being.

Base agent: Reactive, memoryless, opaque, isolated, unreflective, ephemeral.
Thoughtbox agent: Deliberative, learning, transparent, collaborative, self-aware, persistent.

Thoughtbox doesn't improve the agent. It transforms what KIND of agent exists.
